short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate reports for WordPress site templates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate a report of your WordPress site's pages and their corresponding templates with the WP Template Report Generator Chrome extension. Gain valuable insights into your site's structure and easily identify which templates are used for each page.

Key Features:

● View a comprehensive list of all pages on your WordPress site
● Identify the template used for each page
● Gain insights into the structure and organization of your site
● Easily track and manage your site's templates
● Simplify the troubleshooting process by quickly identifying template-related issues

By installing Template Report Generator, you can streamline your WordPress site management and gain a deeper understanding of its structure. Stay organized, optimize your site's performance, and ensure consistent template usage across your pages.
